IDBIndexGetAllKeys.summary:
The getAllKeys() method of the
interface asynchronously retrieves the primary keys of all objects inside the index,
setting them as the result of the request object.

remarks.para:
-Using IndexedDB
-Starting transactions:
-Using transactions:
-Setting a range of keys:
-Retrieving and making changes to your data:
-Using cursors:
-Reference example: To-do Notifications (View the example live).

IDBIndexGetAllKeys.returns: An object on which subsequent events related to this operation are fired.If the operation is successful, the value of the request's property is an {{jsxref("Array")}} of the keys for all records matching the given query, up to the value of count, if count was supplied.
